lead_paragraph: Unsealed NHL documents in the concussion lawsuit brought by former players reveal a snapshot of an internal debate by league officials over head injuries and a deeper concern about the impact of fighting than what had been publicly shared.

headline.print_headline: Declassified NHL Memos, e-Mails Detail Concussion Debate
headline.main: Declassified NHL Memos, e-Mails Detail Concussion Debate

snippet: Unsealed NHL documents in the concussion lawsuit brought by former players reveal a snapshot of an internal debate by league officials over head injuries and a deeper concern about the impact of fighting than what had been publicly shared....
